articles.title: iPhone 16 Pro models may feature thinnest bezels- Know what's expected - HT Tech
articles.description: Apple's upcoming iPhone 16 Pro and Pro Max models are set to feature the world's thinnest screen bezels, significantly improving the screen-to-body ratio. The new iPhones will also boast larger displays, advanced A18 chips, and new capacitive buttons.
